import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function MechanicsCard({category, image, name, shopName, location, rating, experience, mechId}){ return(

{shopName}

{category}
{location}
{name}
  • Experience: {experience} years
  • Rating: {rating} / 5
    • More Details
    ) }
